review.comment: Cody is always helpful and friendly!
review.review_reply: Lynda, thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.

review.comment: These gentlemen were a pleasure to work with. They take pride in their honest hard-work, hard to find these days. I highly recommend this company for all your roof related issues. They’ll help you find a reasonable solutions and work with your budget.
review.review_reply: Thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.

review.comment: They did a great job. Coming on time.  Every technicians wear masks and shoes gloves. By the end of work, they clean up well without leaving any dust and mess. Also Cody(manager) has a great communication with us and tell us what needs to replace or repair. When I shop around. They have the best competitive price
review.review_reply: Thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.
David, thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.

review.comment: Cody and his team at Integris Roofing are extremely professional and they insure that the highest quality material and workmanship will be paramount on each of their jobs.  Integris will show you and explain to you what your job entails and follow through to the end to get the job done right!  I highly recommend Integris Roofing!
review.review_reply: Ryan, thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.
Santos, thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.

review.comment:
Had a great experience with Cody and his team at Integris. They were very quick to get out on sight to perform and inspection and provide bids.  Below are a few highlights.

- In addition to being very efficient and fast…. they use a tarping system that catches the debris falling from the roof to protect your landscaping and expedite clean up. Very thoughtful and non- typical for a contractor.

- They are also very up to date with technology used. Pre- bid Cody used google earth to inspect the roof size/shape/estimated age, etc., which sped the inspection process up. They also have a web-app that provided minute by minute picture updates of the project while it was under way. This was great for me, since I was traveling while they were performing the work.

Al in all- great experience and would highly recommend.

See attached drone pictures Cody shared of the project at completion.
review.review_reply: Reece, thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.

review.comment: I was very pleased with the responsiveness of Integris Roofing. Within a day Cody & Kirk came out for an inspection and estimate, and one week later the replacement was done. The contractors were hard working but also professional and polite. Kirk was on-site all day to oversee the job. All debris and nails were cleaned up when the job was finished. Integris Roofing is a certified Atlas shingle contractor and I would highly recommend them for your roofing job.
review.review_reply: Charleen, thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.
Glad we could help with your roof replacement Fariba!

review.comment: I live in a home with a wall and roof adjoined to the house next door. My neighbor and I sought out estimates for roof replacement and Integris led the pack on price, value and service/responsiveness. Scheduling was easy, they showed up on day of install on time and were careful in protecting my yard and with cleanup. Call Integris and ask for Cody! You won’t be disappointed!
review.review_reply: Monica, thanks for trusting us with your roof replacement! We take great pride in our work and appreciate your review.

review.comment: We had a leak in the attic roof. They came over with the drone to see what might be causing it. Fixed the part That needed fixing and added a few shingles for extra protection. Integrity Roofing was quick to check the problem out and came over early the next day to fix it.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review, Ollie. We're glad to hear that we were able to get the leak fixed quickly and efficiently. Integris Roofing is committed to providing excellent service at a fair price across Houston. Thank you again for taking the time to share your roof repair experience with us!

review.comment: Cody answered during the holiday, was out the next day, and got his crew here the day after. Quick response, quick service. Would definitely recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you Tom for your review and for trusting us as your Houston roofing company of choice! We appreciate hearing about Cody's responsiveness and the quick service he provided. If there is anything we can do in the future for your roof, please don't hesitate to reach out.

review.comment: We were impressed with the new roof installation.  Cody was very thorough when he explained the whole process and was attentive from start to finish.  We would recommend Integris Roofing.  Great job Cody and team!
review.review_reply:
Thank you for your review Margaret! I'm glad to hear Cody did a great job explaining the roofing process and that you were happy with the roof installation process. We'll be sure to pass along your feedback about Cody's work ethic and attentiveness to our team.

We're always looking for ways to improve, so if there is anything we can do in the future, please let us know!

review.comment: We could not have been more pleased with the chimney cap repair that the Integris Roofing team performed. After contacting them, a representative came within the hour, inspected the roof, evaluated the needed repair, and gave us a very reasonable estimate for a complete cap replacement. The work was excellent. Thank you!
review.review_reply:
Joan, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with our roofing team. I'm glad to hear that our team was able to provide a solution quickly and professionally for your Houston home.

We're always happy when we can help our customers avoid an expensive repair by providing them with the information they need to make an educated decision about their roofing needs. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

review.comment: Great company! They are very detail oriented and their project manager Mark is very helpful. They do not cut corners. Happy with our new Atlas roof!
review.review_reply:
Thank you for your review Kirk. We are glad to hear that Mark and the team were able to help with your roofing needs.

We appreciate you taking the time out of your busy day to share this feedback, and we will be sure to pass it on!

review.comment: Cody was very professional and prompt. He took photos before starting work and then again after the work was completed and it was very helpful to see the work performed. I would definitely recommend Integris Roofing.
review.review_reply:
Thanks for taking the time to review your roofing experience Haylie. We really appreciate it at Integris Roofing!

I'm glad Cody was able to help you and that he took photos of the work being done. That's a great way for our customers to see what we do and also how their property looks after we're finished with it. I'll pass on your feedback about his professionalism as well as the timeliness of his response so that he knows this is appreciated by you and others too.

Thank you again, if there's anything else we can do please let us know our team of expert Houston roofers are ready the next time you need us!

review.comment: Cody and his team did a great job fixing a roof leak. They were very responsive and came out twice to reinforce the repair and confirm the job was done properly. Out of multiple companies, they were by far the best priced option and we are very happy with their service.
review.review_reply:
Thank you for the five-star review Constanza! We appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that Cody was able to help fix your roof leak.

We're committed to providing a quality roofing service at affordable prices, so I'm glad we were able to meet all of your expectations. If there's anything else we can do for you, please feel free to give us a call.

review.comment: I was unaware that my roof was leaking until the bathroom ceiling fell, so I immediately started searching the internet for roofing companies.  I read the reviews and choose Integris Roofing, because this company received the best reviews. Cody and his Team were AWESOME from start to finish!!! Cody came to do a roof inspection the first day I called and came back the next day to tarp the roof. Cody took pictures and explained where the leak occurred, why the leak occurred, and what had to be repaired/replaced. Cody worked with me and the insurance company to ensure that we had all the information to start and complete the claims process.  I received updates from Cody during the entire installation and repair process.  I knew what day/time the crew was coming and who was coming.  Cody came by periodically during the roof installation to inspect the crews work and progress.  Once the job was complete, Cody came back for a final inspection.  He did the same for the bathroom repairs; came by to check on the progress and came back for a final inspection.  In addition, I asked Cody to replace the soffits and fascia boards across the back of my house.  The quote    was very reasonable and the workers did a GREAT job!!!!  Integris Roofing did an AMAZING job on my roof, bathroom, and soffits.  Cody is very professional and reasonable.  I highly recommend Integris Roofing and will definitely use them for future needs.
review.review_reply:
Thanks for your review, Tina. We understand how much of an issue a roof leak can be and we are glad that we were able to help you repair your roof promptly. We're so glad you chose us to take care of your roof replacement needs and we appreciate the opportunity to earn your business!

Cody is a great asset to Integris Roofing, he's knowledgeable in all aspects of roofing and has an excellent work ethic. I'm so happy that you found him helpful during this roof repair process. If there's anything else we can do for you, please don't hesitate to contact us!

review.comment: Cody and Abram explained every step of the progress of getting a new roof going through the insurance. I have a beautiful high performance architectural shingled roof. The color is beautiful. They inspected the roof after the job was finished and answered all my questions. I Highly recommend this company. You’ll be glad with their work.
review.review_reply:
I'm so glad to hear that you found our team members Cody and Abram helpful. We're proud of the roofing work they do for each one of our customers, especially when it's a job as big as replacing your roof.

Thank you again for choosing Integris Roofing for your Houston roof replacement needs, we'll be sure to pass on your kind words!

review.comment: Integris roofing it’s the best company I’ve ever used for roof repairing. They are responsible and on time. They were really patient and answered every question we had during the inspection, as well as walk us through every step on how they are going to fix. On the day of repairing, they come on time, and really responsive. Highly recommended!!
review.review_reply:
Thank you for your honest review, Yuna! We are grateful to hear that our team was able to exceed your expectations and provide a stellar roof repair experience.

We're committed to providing quick and responsive roofing service to the Houston area and we're glad the workmanship exceeded your expectations. Thank you again for taking the time to share with us about our company's excellent performance and for choosing Integris Roofing.

review.comment: Did a wonderful job on our roof. Explained everything very throughly. Even showed videos on the process used to protect from leaks around vents since we have a flat roof. Would definitely recommend. Their price was very competitive.
review.review_reply:
Thanks for your review, Cassie. We're glad to hear you were happy with our roof repair services and appreciate that you took the time to share your experience.

We always want to make sure we're providing customers with a good value and are competitive in price--we'll be sure to pass along this feedback internally so that we can continue striving towards these goals!

Thank you for your review, Scott. We appreciate your taking the time to share about our company and we're glad to hear that you were satisfied with our service. Our team strives to provide high quality roofing services at a fair price so it's nice to know that this is what you experienced during your project.

review.comment: Cody and his team do good quality work . I highly recommend them for any roofing work .
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review, Marcos. We are so glad to hear that Integris Roofing were able to provide quality work during your experience with us! We appreciate the time you took to leave this feedback and will share it with them. Thank you again for trusting Integris Roofing in your roofing needs!

review.comment: Integris  did an excellent job with our standing seam tin roof.    Cody was on top of the job.  He kept me informed start time,  rain delay, and finish.    Everything went very smoothly.  I can highly recommend
review.review_reply: I'm so glad to hear that Cody was able to take care of your roofing needs and you're happy with the end result or your new standing seam tin roof. Thank you for taking the time to review our services, we appreciate it!

review.comment: Cody was great to work with! We had a leak in our roof and he came out immediately to diagnose and temporarily fix it until he could do permanent repairs. Very conscientious!
review.review_reply: Thanks for choosing us to repair your roof!

review.comment: Very pleased with a job excellent job
review.review_reply: Glad we could assist with your roof replacement Maria!

review.comment: I HIGHLY recommend this company.  Cody was extremely professional, honest & nice. Intregris Roofing are 6⭐. Cody came out did a free estimate, answered all of my questions took pictures before and after; provided a fair price. Cody & his technician did a great job. Thank U guys 👍👍
review.review_reply: Glad we could assist your roof repairs. Thank you Ms. Houston!

review.comment: Very professional and easy to work with.  Came out to inspect the damage quickly and was able to come out to make the repairs even faster.  Excellent service and quality of repairs.
review.review_reply: Glad we could help with your roof repairs. Thanks Jason!
Glad we could help replace your roof after the hail storm. Thanks Luke!

review.comment: I had an awesome experience from beginning to end.  I loved the estimate it was detailed down to the penny.  They did what they said they were going to do and in a timely manner.  I'm very happy with this company.
review.review_reply: Glad we could assist with your roof replacement in Houston. Thanks Tywana!

review.comment: I could not ask for better service. They were amazing and friendly. Work was done in a timely matter. Everything was cleaned up. I would definitely recommend this business to everyone I know.

review.comment: Our company had the opportunity to work with Cody and his sales team. Very professional, prompt, and sincere. I would highly recommend Integris roofing to building owners in the Houston area.

review.comment: Cody was very professional and knowledgeable. He was always available for questions/concerns. He made the process less stressful. Definitely recommend Cody and his crew.
review.review_reply: Mrs. Fontenot your family was a joy to work for. Thank you for trusting us to be your Houston roofing company!!

review.comment: They helped us replace our roof after the hail storm. I highly recommend Cody and his team.
review.review_reply: We appreciate the positive feedback Tanner, thank you allowing us to be your hail roof repair company of choice!

review.comment: While roof repair is likely a "time will tell" type deal, the repairs Cody performed about a month ago have held up so far. When initially contacted, he came out and did the inspection/made an estimate promptly. His estimate was below that of another company (for similar work). The repairs themselves only took a morning, and he offers a 3yr warranty on his work. He was good with communication and pictures throughout. This was my only experience with roof repair, so not much to compare with; but I have no complaints!
review.review_reply: Glad we could help with your roof repairs in Houston, Tx and we appreciate your feedback!

review.comment: I recently had some damage to my roof from a recent hail storm. Cody and his team with Integris were able to get my roof approved and replaced through my insurance. I’m very happy with the end result and it was a very easy process. I highly recommend choosing Integris as your roofing contractor.
review.review_reply: Glad we could help replace your roof James, thanks for choosing us to be your Houston roof repair company!

review.comment: Cody and his crew did an excellent job from start to finish. He did a great job explaining what to expect and paid attention to details like painting the flashing to match the roof color and thoroughly cleaning up at the end. Thanks for a job well done!  We highly recommend Integris Roofing!
review.review_reply: Hi Ron, thanks for choosing Integris Roofing as your Houston roof replacement company. Glad we could replace your roof due to the hail damage.

review.comment: Really happy with the customer service with Cody at Integris roofing. He gave a thorough  and free inspection of my roof and caulked the potential leak areas at no cost. He was extremely fast at following up and answering all questions I had. And was very quick at providing me not only roofing but painting estimates as well. I would recommend this company if you are looking for repairs. Very trustworthy.
review.review_reply: Ashley, thanks for giving us the opportunity to be your roof leak repair company in Houston, Tx!

review.comment: Did a great job would use again
review.review_reply: Thank you Leo for giving us the opportunity to be your Houston roofing company !

review.comment:
Look no further for an affordable, trustworthy, and professional roofer. Cody is extremely knowledgeable and very detailed.

He showed up within one hour after I called requesting an estimate for my roof leak. He checked it out and gave me multiple options. He recommended I replace the entire roof based on the age and multiple issues he viewed on the roof. I’m glad I listened to him because there were over 9 leaks later identified when the roof was replaced.

He quoted me an extremely affordable rate that was the best out of 6 total quotes. He responded the quickest and had the most detailed quote. The entire roof was replaced one week after he came out for an estimate.

Please give this company a shot, I cannot recommend Integris and Cody enough.
review.review_reply: Rawad, thanks for trusting us as your local roofing contractor in Houston!
Thank you Richard!

review.comment: It was very easy to work with Cody and such a super nice guy very polite & professional he quoted us a price we could afford out of pocket plus insurance we felt very comfortable in his presence. He fell in love with our poodle Apollo & vise-versa anybody who loves lap dogs got to be a good person
review.review_reply: We hope you enjoy the look of your new roof replacement!

review.comment: Glad I choose them as my roofing contractor! They completed my roof in a day and had everything cleaned up. I highly recommend them if you’re in the Houston area to replace your roof!
review.review_reply: So glad we could help replace your roof. Thanks for trusting our roof replace team Jonathan!

review.comment: Great quality roofing company. The service was top notch and very professional. Would definitely recommend.
review.review_reply: Josh, thanks for choosing us as your Houston roofing contractor!

review.comment: Integers Roofing did an amazing job replacing my roof! If you’re in the Houston area I would highly recommend their team!
review.review_reply: Glad we could take care of you Avery, thanks for choosing us as your Houston roof replacement company !

review.comment: I called a couple of roofing companies but Integris was the only one that responded and within a couple of days came out to do an inspection and estimate. I waited to get one or two more estimates just to compare, but no other companies replied back. I did check on the the past jobs that Integris had completed and was confident that they would do a great job for my home. They did some impeccable work. They take pride in their craft as well as job completion. My wife and I are more than satisfied with the job that Integris Roofing did on our home. I would recommend this company to anyone needing roofing work done on their home.
review.review_reply: Albert, we thank you for choosing as your Houston roofing contractor.

review.comment: They came out very fast and I got my roof on before the others could even come out for an estimate! Also the price was less for superior products than I had been quoted by the other roofer that I was able to get out for an estimate .
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words Malcom! We hope you enjoy your new GAF roof!

review.comment: I would recommend Integris Roofing to ANYBODY! I even referred my brother to Integris as well after hurricane Delta did a number to both of our roofs. The workers were great, they cleaned up the yard after they were finished and didn’t leave anything behind. Cody & Kurt came by to have us sign a contract for the roof a few days prior and visited with us like they were family. My roof is exceptionally beautiful and I am VERY happy with the results.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words Dale! We hope you enjoy your new GAF roof!
